Description: The company failed to discharge the duty imposed on them by section 2(1) of the Act, in that they failed to ensure, so far as was reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare at work of all their employees, by failing to ensure they were not exposed to the risks associated with metal working fluids, whereby they are guilty of an offence contrary to Section 33(1)(a) of the Act.
